item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a postdoc at Department of Mathematical Sciences of the University of Copenhagen in the Mathematical Biology group, mentored by Elisenda Feliu. Previously, I was a PhD student at Department de Matemàtiques of the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona under the supervision of Joaquim Roé. My PhD Thesis Research Interest My research interests are in pure and applied Algebraic Geometry. On the pure side, I study the geometry of a locally closed subfunctor of the Hilbert functor aiming to obtain sharper upper bounds on the dimension of linear systems of curves on surfaces.

item.title: Contact
